As part of the online game I want you to create a presentation on the fossil you have selected. This way, you can learn a lot about it and use the info to help make the game

## Steps

1. Sign up for Sutori

> a. Go to https://www.sutori.com/signup and sign up for the site
>
> b. When the site asks “Before you get started, let us know who
> you are for a more tailored experience” make sure to choose
> 'student’
>
>  c. When the box pops up asking for a code put this code there:
>   **twwk4**

2. Learn to use Sutori

> a. [This video is how I learned and it is pretty clear](https://www.sutori.com/story/beginner-s-guide-how-to-create-a-story--
846BuKMUDUkFdgXsjW6Do62E):


> b. [Also, check out this](https://www.sutori.com/story/student-tutorial--
fDrqDhaMXxGZYn1EAoCux3m6)

> c. If you have any questions just let me know.
